titles: The grand case of conscience concerning the Engagement stated & resolved. Or, a strict survey of the Solemn League & Covenant in reference to the present Engagement.
publisher: Printed by John Macock for Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at his shop at the three Daggers neer the Inner Temple, Fleetstreet,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Solemn League and Covenant (1643). --  Early works to 1800.
